item.title: NBA-Shotchart
item.description: An interactive dashboard for NBA player shot data. Note: currently under maintaince as NBA has imposed CORS restrictions that prevent the package from being used in a browser directly Work Summary Built and deployed a dashboard using React JS, D3 and Ant Design to visualize NBA players’ shot performance Improved user experience by adding 4 data filters and an autocomplete search bar providing player image preview

item.title: Tweety Pipe
item.description: A real-time data processor built with Spark and Kafka. Data visualized with a simple Flask app and Chart.js Work Summary Implemented a real-time data processor with Spark and Flask to visualize trending Twitter hashtags Designed and implemented a real-time sentiment monitor with Kafka, processing 3500 Tweets per minute Visualized results with Ajax and Chart.js for 1% of all public Tweets Technologies involved: Python, Spark, Kafka, Flask, Google Compute Engine, Twitter API

item.title: Projects
item.description: Tweety-Pipe: A Real-Time Data Processor with Spark and Kafka NBA-Shortchart: An Interactive Visualization Dashboard for NBA player Shot Data AFK, grabbing lunch, more to come!

item.title: Education
item.description: -- University of Toronto, St. George Honours Bachelor of Science Year 5 Upper-level CS GPA: 3.86/4.0 Year-4 & Year-5 GPA: 3.92/4.0 Specialist: Computer Science, Minors: Statistics, Math 09/2016 – 06/2021 Courses include: Operating Systems, Software Engineering, Computer Networks, Deep Learning & Neural Networks, Statistical Methods for Machine Learning II, Intro. to Mobile Robotics, Intro. to Image Understanding, Algorithms & Data Structures

item.title: Work
item.description: -- Activision Blizzard - Demonware Demonware is an Activision Blizzard studio that provides online web services for some of the world’s largest video game franchises. Demonware’s services include matchmaking, in-game purchase, social networking and many more, producing 133,000+ metrics a second and impacting almost half a billion players’ online gameplay experience. Software Engineering Intern Call of Duty Modern Warfare, Warzone, Black Ops Cold War (WATCH THE TRAILER) 05/2020 – 08/2020 Toronto, ON
